ygData.subject: Re: Your gate is unstable and closes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the ... Sorry Neil but this is wrong. The unstable gate message has been around since the game went commercial. I was gating on the 2nd day of release and
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 2 Jun 1999 17:44:52 -0700, Neil Lambert wrote:

> From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>
>
> the mana loss is an extra unwanted bonus but that message has replaced
the
> "your spell has interrupted" message you usually get.


Sorry Neil but this is wrong. The unstable gate message has been around
since the game went commercial. I was gating on the 2nd day of release and
got the message right after I got the "your spell has fizzled" message.
Unstable gates are just an added little advantage.....or at least a way to
cost us some mana...


Cinius Shade of the 5th circle(Mith Marr)
